channel.title: Introducing Project Molten. A premium RSC experience
channel.description:
I’m a long time RSC player and recently noticed a huge gap in the quality of servers out in the RSC community.
Thus, introducing, [b]Project Molten[/b].
Project Molten is a premium PK & Staking server set to release within the next few weeks. This is not just another old source thrown up with half-assed custom updates.
This is the [i]REAL DEAL.[/i]
- Source written from scratch and customized over a 6 month period by professional programmers. - Hosted on an extremely fast and reliable dedicated server. DDoS Protected. - New sprites and graphics redesigned by professional graphic designers specializing in pixel art. - Thoroughly geared towards the 20-something year olds that don’t want to grind all day but still want a server worth playing with items worth something. - COMPLETE transparency in terms of how much $ the server spends, takes in. We will literally post monthly statements of this. Why? The RSC community has too long dealt with money grabbers and corruption, this is one way we’re willing to show that we’re different. - No Moderators. The only staff members will be 2 Admins, Me and the main coder. - We realize bots are inevitable, but at the same time we don’t want to run a nazi style server with moderators harassing players all day long. Thus, bans will be issued on a massive scale every month, like on the real RSC.
[i]Overall we have spent upwards of $6,000 USD so far on this project.[/i]
Something I would like to reiterate, because I believe it's the biggest reason a lot of people are hesitant to ever play another RSC server: There will be absolutely NO pay2win or corruption on our server tolerated. We will never sell items for cash, in fact we will invoke penalties on users if they ask to buy items/stats repeatedly. There will be NO moderators, thus no favouritism amongst the players. I know it's a long shot but I hope all the people that vowed to never play another RSC server again due to the rampant corruption give us a shot. You will not regret it.
This is all the information I will be releasing for the moment, just to generate a bit of buzz. Be warned though, this is NOT a replica. This server is customized from the bottom to the top. Think Stork-PK on steroids. This is literally RSC updated for 2015. We’re excited as hell and we hope you are too. More updates within the coming days.
All the best, James.
